text: The brown pelican (Pelecanus occidentalis) is a large bird that lives along the coasts of the Atlantic, Pacific Ocean, and Gulf of Mexico in North and South America. Brown pelicans are carnivores (meat-eaters) and hunt during the day (they are diurnal). They eat mostly fish and some amphibians and crustaceans. category:Birds of North America category:Birds of South America Category:Pelecaniformes Category:National symbols of Saint Kitts and Nevis
title: Brown pelican
